unnormalised: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has announced a new initiative to improve digital access across India. The head office is located at Electronics Niketan, 6, CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi - 110003. The program, aimed at bridging the digital divide, will establish several regional centers.
normalised: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (M-e-i-t-Y) has announced a new initiative to improve digital access across India. The head office is located at Electronics Niketan, six, C-G-O Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi - one hundred and ten thousand and three. The program, aimed at bridging the digital divide, will establish several regional centers.

unnormalised: The National Informatics Centre (NIC), a key department under MeitY, plays a vital role. Its headquarters is at A-Block, CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi-110003. NIC provides essential IT support to the government. They're currently working on strengthening the cybersecurity infrastructure for govt. websites.
normalised: The National Informatics Centre (N-I-C), a key department under M-e-i-t-Y, plays a vital role. Its headquarters is at A-Block, C-G-O Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and three. N-I-C provides essential I-T support to the government. They're currently working on strengthening the cybersecurity infrastructure for government websites.

unnormalised: The Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI), responsible for Aadhaar, has its main office at Ground Floor, Supreme Court Metro Station, New Delhi - 110001. UIDAI's regional offices are located across the country. Each office helps with Aadhaar enrolment and updates.
normalised: The Unique Identification Authority of India (U-I-D-A-I), responsible for Aadhaar, has its main office at Ground Floor, Supreme Court Metro Station, New Delhi - one hundred and ten thousand and one. U-I-D-A-I's regional offices are located across the country. Each office helps with Aadhaar enrolment and updates.

unnormalised: The Department of Telecommunications (DoT), crucial for connectivity, is based at Sanchar Bhawan, 20, Ashoka Road, New Delhi-110001. DoT is responsible for regulating telecom services across the nation. The department also manages spectrum allocation for mobile operators.
normalised: The Department of Telecommunications (D-o-T), crucial for connectivity, is based at Sanchar Bhawan, twenty, Ashoka Road, New Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and one. D-o-T is responsible for regulating telecom services across the nation. The department also manages spectrum allocation for mobile operators.

unnormalised: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO), a pivotal institution for India's space program, operates from Antariksh Bhavan, New BEL Road, Bangalore – 560094. ISRO's work benefits various sectors, from communication to disaster management. They are launching a new satellite on 15/08/2024.
normalised: The Indian Space Research Organisation (I-S-R-O), a pivotal institution for India's space program, operates from Antariksh Bhavan, New B-E-L Road, Bangalore – five hundred and sixty thousand and ninety four. I-S-R-O's work benefits various sectors, from communication to disaster management. They are launching a new satellite on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The Ministry of Education's main office is located at Shastri Bhawan, Dr. Rajendra Prasad Road, New Delhi-110001. The ministry oversees educational policies and programs. They are planning to implement a new curriculum in the next academic year. This curriculum is expected to be rolled out by July 2025.
normalised: The Ministry of Education's main office is located at Shastri Bhawan, Doctor Rajendra Prasad Road, New Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and one. The ministry oversees educational policies and programs. They are planning to implement a new curriculum in the next academic year. This curriculum is expected to be rolled out by July two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: The Department of Higher Education, functioning under the Ministry of Education, is also housed at Shastri Bhawan, Dr. Rajendra Prasad Road, New Delhi - 110001. It focuses on promoting higher education and research. This includes universities, colleges, and other educational institutions.
normalised: The Department of Higher Education, functioning under the Ministry of Education, is also housed at Shastri Bhawan, Doctor Rajendra Prasad Road, New Delhi - one hundred and ten thousand and one. It focuses on promoting higher education and research. This includes universities, colleges, and other educational institutions.

unnormalised: The Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), a significant educational board, has its main office at 2, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-110092. CBSE conducts examinations for secondary and senior secondary levels. They are announcing the exam schedule for 2025 soon. The CBSE also recently updated their curriculum standards on 22/07/2024.
normalised: The Central Board of Secondary Education (C-B-S-E), a significant educational board, has its main office at two, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and ninety two. C-B-S-E conducts examinations for secondary and senior secondary levels. They are announcing the exam schedule for two thousand and twenty five soon. The C-B-S-E also recently updated their curriculum standards on twenty second July two thousand and twenty four.
